articles.title: Neanderthal DNA Exists in Humans, But One Piece Is Mysteriously Missing - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Neanderthals, the closest cousins of modern humans, lived in parts of Europe and Asia until their extinction some 30,000 years ago.
articles.content:
Neanderthals, the closest cousins of modern humans, lived in parts of Europe and Asia until their extinction some 30,000 years ago.
